RESOLUTION
CONDEMNING THE FRUSTRATED EXTRAJUDICIAL KILLING OF TEACHERS ZHAYDEE AND RAMIL CABAÑELEZ BY SUSPECTED AGENTS UNDER THE 8TH INFANTRY BATTALION OF THE ARMED FORCES OF THE PHILIPPINES AND DIRECTING THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES COMMITTEE ON HUMAN RIGHTS TO CONDUCT AN URGENT INVESTIGATION IN AID OF LEGISLATION INTO THE SAME
